stripped_text: While the Runner is accessing this asset in R&D, they must reveal it. When the Runner accesses this asset, they lose 1 credit. If they are tagged, do 1 net damage.
text:
While the Runner is accessing this asset in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this asset, they lose 1[credit]. If they are tagged, do 1 net damage.
title: Esca
